mapper.sql: ID, CODE, DELIVERYCOMPANY, CLIENT, CARNUM, RAWTOBACCO, CHECKNUM, CHECKDATE, OPERATOR_
mapper.select: SELECT ID FROM RAWCHECK where CHECKNUM = #{checknum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT rc.checknum,rc.carnum,rc.checkdate,decom.name_ DELIVERYCOM , clcom.name_ CLIENT ,rc.carnum,us.name_ OPERATOR_,tl.levelname_ LEVELNAME,rt.producingyear PROCEDUREYEAR,pa.name_ PROCEDUREAREA,tt.name_ TOBACCOCATEGORY FROM Rawcheck rc JOIN company decom ON decom.id = rc.deliverycompany JOIN company clcom ON clcom.ID = rc.client JOIN USERS us ON rc.operator_ = us.id JOIN Rawtobacco rt ON rt.id = rc.rawtobacco JOIN producingarea pa ON pa.id = rt.producingarea JOIN tobaccolevel tl ON rt.level_ = tl.levelid JOIN tobaccocategory tt ON tt.id = rt.tobaccocategory WHERE rc.checknum = #{checknum}

SELECT rc.checknum,rc.carnum,rc.checkdate,decom.name_ DELIVERYCOM , clcom.name_ CLIENT ,rc.carnum,us.name_ OPERATOR_,tl.levelname_ LEVELNAME, rt.producingyear PROCEDUREYEAR,pa.name_ PROCEDUREAREA,tt.name_ TOBACCOCATEGORY FROM Rawcheck rc JOIN company decom ON decom.id = rc.deliverycompany JOIN company clcom ON clcom.ID = rc.client JOIN USERS us ON rc.operator_ = us.id JOIN Rawtobacco rt ON rt.id = rc.rawtobacco JOIN producingarea pa ON pa.id = rt.producingarea JOIN tobaccolevel tl ON rt.level_ = tl.levelid JOIN tobaccocategory tt ON tt.id = rt.tobaccocategory WHERE rc.id = #{checkId}
